p.d: From the 1st Century BC to the 5th Century AD, the Romans covered the length and breadth of France leaving many vestiges in their wake. Lorant Deutsch follows in their footsteps starting from the Col du Perthuis and passing through Lyon, Boulogne-sur-Mer, Strasbourg, Vienne and Saint-Romain-en-Gal. Directed by: Nicolas Ferraro, Paul Florent (France, 2017) With Lorant Deutsch.
